ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: If you are interested in learning about mathematically well-motivated techniques for computer vision, definitely take this course.
If you are interested in computer vision (at a theoretical and working level) and the mathematical techniques underlying it, you should take this class.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: Great exposure to how many different kinds of math come together in a truly cutting edge field.
This course will be very helpful in my research, as I learned several techniques in differential geometry and geometric harmonics that I plan to use.
